<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable/disable an audio feature, features are: "lowpass", "building_interior".
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[enableAudioFeature]] [feature, enable]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> feature: [[String]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] enable, [[false]], disabled
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - Previous state
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> prevState = [[enableAudioFeature]] ["lowpass", [[true]]];
</value></part></template>
